snippet: Highlights from the online piracy discussion.
abstract: Highlights from the online piracy discussion.
lead_paragraph: Times readers - at least the readers who have commented on my piracy column - seem to have a libertarian streak. Many of them are fiercely wary of any government regulation of what happens on the Internet. Much of the mail bristles with resentment of the corporate behemoths that have tried to protect music, film and books by building higher legal walls around their property.
